# Archive Directory

This directory contains historical documentation, reports, and development artifacts that are not part of the active development workflow.

## Structure

- **reports/** - Test reports, status documents, completion summaries
- **proofs/** - Proof documents and validation artifacts
- **summaries/** - Implementation summaries and delivery reports
- **dev-notes/** - Development notes and investigation logs
- **temp-files/** - Temporary files and one-off scripts

## Policy

Files in this directory are:
- Historical reference only
- Not part of active development
- Can be safely removed if disk space is needed
- Should not be linked from main documentation

For active documentation, see `/docs/`
